channel.title: Dual interface support
channel.description:
Any idea why even when I think I have a dual side menu working. (meaning You know the different tabs that allow you to select equipment inventory etc. Mine is freestanding by itself in my client. Respondent to hotkeys) I can't get it to allow you to have two different interface/tabs open at once interacting with both. It screws up.
Does anyone have the old client released a while back that had move-able freestanding sidebars/tabs?
